text: Merita Berntsen (born 24 February 1969) is a Norwegian beach volleyball player, born in Bergen. She competed in the women's tournament at the 1996 Summer Olympics in Atlanta, with teammate Ragni Hestad. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bergen Category:Norwegian beach volleyball players Category:Olympic beach volleyball players of Norway Category:Beach volleyball players at the 1996 Summer Olympics
title: Merita Berntsen
